info.name: Classic Models API
info.description: Complete API collection for Classic Models e-commerce system with authentication, CRUD operations, search capabilities, and rate limiting demonstrations

request.description: Public endpoint to demonstrate rate limiting. Limited to 5 requests per minute per IP address.

body.raw:
{
  "productcode": "S10_1678",
  "productname": "1969 Harley Davidson Ultimate Chopper",
  "productline": "Motorcycles",
  "productscale": "1:10",
  "productvendor": "Min Lin Diecast",
  "productdescription": "This replica features working kickstand, front suspension, gear-shift lever, footpegs, detachable rear wheel, sprocket and chain.",
  "quantityinstock": 7933,
  "buyprice": "48.81",
  "msrp": "95.70"
}

{
  "productcode": "S10_1678",
  "productname": "Updated 1969 Harley Davidson Ultimate Chopper",
  "productline": "Motorcycles",
  "productscale": "1:10",

  "productdescription": "Updated description for this motorcycle replica",
  "quantityinstock": 8000,

}

request.description: Retrieve all orders for a specific customer. This endpoint provides the complete sales history for the customer.
